content.title: Cash Award (APB&OCWWB)
content.department: Department of Labour and Employment, Government of Arunachal Pradesh
content.beneficiary: Children of registered Building & Other Construction workers
content.details: The scheme 'Cash Award' was started by the Department of Labour and Employment, Govt. of Arunachal Pradesh for registered workers of Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB). The state government in order to encourage the children of the registered Building & Other Construction workers in scoring good marks in the examinations proposes to institute every year cash awards to three male and female children of the beneficiaries in each stream.
eligibility: The worker should be a permanent resident of Arunachal Pradesh.
The worker must be employed in the Building and Other Construction works.
The worker should be registered with Labour Welfare Board (APB&OCWWB).
The worker’s membership must be active.
Children for whom the award is applied must have passed the class X and XII Board or equivalent examinations.
Children (one son and one daughter) of the registered worker with a membership, who secure the highest marks in their District in Metric examination.
content.application_process: Offline. The applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&OCWWB of the respective District, fill the application form completely and attach all the relevant documents, and submit the application form to the concerned office.
documents_required: Identity proof i.e. Aadhaar Card, Voter ID card, etc.
Xerox copy of the registration card of the worker
Bank Account number/ front page of the passbook

faqs.question: What is the objective of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The objective of this scheme is to encourage the children of the registered Building & Other Construction workers in scoring good marks in the examinations.

faqs.question: By which department was this scheme launched?
faqs.answer: Department of Labour and Employment, Government of Arunachal Pradesh.

faqs.question: What is the full form of APB&OCWWB?
faqs.answer: Arunachal Pradesh Building & Other Construction Workers Welfare Board.

faqs.question: How much cash award will be given to the eligible worker?
faqs.answer: Cash assistance of ₹500/-, ₹750/- and ₹1000/- will be given to the eligible children of the registered workers.

faqs.question: Is it mandatory to be registered under Board for a worker?
faqs.answer: Yes, the labour/worker must be a registered worker under the Board.

faqs.question: What should be the minimum qualification of the children of registered worker?
faqs.answer: Children for whom the award is applied must have passed the class X and XII Board or equivalent examinations.

faqs.question: Who is eligible under this scheme?
faqs.answer: Children (one son and one daughter) of the registered worker with a membership, who secure the highest marks in their District in the Metric examination, will be eligible for the award.

faqs.question: Is this scheme only for the children of the registered worker /labour of Arunachal Pradesh?
faqs.answer: Yes, the children of the registered worker are only eligible for the scheme.

faqs.question: Are the children of those workers whose membership of the Board has expired also eligible to take the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: No, the workers’ membership shall be active to take the benefits of the scheme.

faqs.question: How can I avail the benefits of the scheme?
faqs.answer: The applicant needs to contact Registering Officers, APB&OCWWB of the respective District.
